name: Michal Podhradsky's profile page
body:
### Publications
* **An Open-Source Real-Time Rapid Software Prototyping and Testing Platform for Unmanned Aerial System Research and Operations**, _Calvin Coopmans, Michal Podhradsky, Nathan Hoffer, The 2016 International Conference of Unmanned Aircraft Systems (ICUAS’16)_ [[PDF]](https://github.com/podhrmic/podhrmic.github.io/blob/master/docs/ICUAS16_0125_FI.pdf)
* **Software and Hardware-in-the-Loop Verification of Flight Dynamics Model and Flight Control Simulation of a Fixed-Wing Unmanned Aerial Vehicle**, _Calvin Coopmans, Michal Podhradsky, Nathan Hoffer, 3rd Workshop on Research, Education and Development of Unmanned Aerial Systems, (RED-UAS 2015)_ [[PDF]](https://github.com/podhrmic/podhrmic.github.io/blob/master/docs/reduas2015_hitl.pdf)
* **Battery State-Of-Charge Based Altitude Controller for Small, Low Cost Multirotor Unmanned Aerial Vehicles**, _Michal Podhradsky, Calvin Coopmans, Austin Jensen, Journal of Intelligent & Robotic Systems (2013), Volume 74, Issue 1-2, pp. 193 - 207_
* **Battery Model-Based Thrust Controller for a Small, Low Cost Multirotor Unmanned Aerial Vehicles**, _Michal Podhradsky, Austin M. Jensen, Calvin Coopmans, Jarret Bone, The 2013 International Conference of Unmanned Aircraft Systems (ICUAS’13)_ [[PDF]](https://github.com/podhrmic/podhrmic.github.io/blob/master/docs/BatteryModel-BasedThrustControllerforSmallLowCostMultirotorUnmannedAerialVehicles.pdf)
* **Small Low Cost Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Lithium-Polymer Battery Monitoring System**, _Michal Podhradsky, Austin M. Jensen, Calvin Coopmans, Jarret Bone, 2013 ASME/IEEE International Conference on Mechatronic and Embedded Systems and Applications (MESA2013)_
* **A Multi-Agent System for Autonomous Adaptive Control of a Flapping-Wing Micro Air Vehicle**, __Michal Podhradsky,  Garrison Greenwood, John Gallagher, Eric Matson, IEEE International Conference on Evolvable Systems, (ICES 2015)__
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
